item.title: [GLOBAL][Databases] - MongoDB migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 17, 11:54 UTC  -  Jul 28, 11:54 UTC

May 23, 07:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/07/2023 11:54 UTC
End time : 28/07/2023 11:54 UTC
Service impact : A small downtime may be experienced for less than 15 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will be doing a migration for our MongoDB nodes.

item.title: [Global][PublicCloud] - OpenStack - RabbitMQ upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 08:00 UTC  -  Aug 9, 10:00 UTC

Jun 21, 01:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/07/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/08/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API will be unavailable for 30min up to 2H during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for RabbitMQ (Message queue service).
The upgrade will be rolled out following this schedule :
w27 (03/07)
BHS1 03/07 08:00 UTC
SYD1 04/07 13:00 UTC
w28 (10/07)
BHS3 10/07 08:00 UTC
SGP1 11/07 13:00 UTC
DE1 12/07 19:00 UTC
w29 (17/07)
BHS5 17/07 08:00 UTC
WAW1 17/07 19:00 UTC
SBG5 18/07 19:00 UTC
GRA1 19/07 19:00 UTC
w30 (24/07)
GRA11 24/07 19:00 UTC
UK1 25/07 19:00 UTC
GRA5 26/07 19:00 UTC
SBG7 27/07 19:00 UTC
w31 (31/07)
US-WEST-OR1 31/07 08:00 UTC
GRA9 31/07 19:00 UTC
US-EAST-VA-1 01/08 08:00 UTC
w32 (07/08)
GRA7 07/08 19:00 UTC
GRA3 08/08 19:00 UTC

item.title: [SPD][CLOUD ARCHIVE] - Update Archive system
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 27, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Jun 16, 07:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/06/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 27/06/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Archive will be delay during the operation between 7:30 UTC and 10:00 UTC
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the archive system.

item.title: [Global][PublicCloud] - Images EoL
item.description:
Jun 26, 12:51 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 26, 12:50 UTC
Scheduled - End time : 19/07/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use.

Several images that we are currently offering for Public Cloud and VPS are going to reach or has already reached End of Life (EoL).
On July 19th, 2023, we will proceed to End of Life these images from Public Cloud and VPS offerings.
You can read furthermore about our distribution End Of Life policy here: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801

Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for Public Cloud and VPS environments.
EoL Distribution EoL / EoS date Alternative Distribution Recommended action
Debian 9 2022-07-01 Debian 10 or 11 Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 34 2022-06-07 Fedora 37 or 38 Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 35 2022-12-13 Fedora 37 or 38 Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 36 2023-05-16 Fedora 37 or 38 Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 18.04 2023-06-01 Ubuntu 20.04, 22.04 or 23.04 Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 21.10 2022-07-14 Ubuntu 20.04, 22.04 or 23.04 Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 22.10 2023-07-01 Ubuntu 20.04, 22.04 or 23.04 Backup and upgrade distribution

Starting from July 19th, 2023, you will no longer be able to purchase or reinstall services with the above-mentioned images.
If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend you to either change them to another distribution or upload your own image and use it instead.

You can refer to the following guides to:
Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306
Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319

For any question, please reach out to our support team.

item.title: [GRA1/GRA3][PublicCloud] - OpenStack API perturbation
item.description:
Jun 26, 15:14 UTC
Identified - Update : This incident is related to this incident https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/fcwl3mwh75b9

A network equipement must be replaced

Jun 26, 12:20 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 26, 12:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API responses might experience some perturbation.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
